title: Affirmation
description: The family saga continues in this holiday edition of Affirmation: Alfonzo Volume VIII. Love, loyalty and trust are affirmed. A marriage seals a bond. Brothers and an enforcer stand together and apart to handle the family business along with the women who have captured their hearts.Whose side are you on, the Don's or the enemies?"Death to the enemies of my family."-The Giacanti motto
author: S.W. Frank
